short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This plugin provides a simple and quick way to copy random Lorem Ipsum words, sentences and paragraphs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
In the daily work of a web developer and web designer you often come to a point where you would like to have filler texts or pictures. Now for this cases there are the wonderful dummy texts of Lorem Ipsum. But until now you always had to open another web page.
This has now come to an end.
With a simple click it is possible to copy words, sentences, whole paragraphs or even pictures to the clipboard.
The length of sentences and paragraphs can be defined by the user.
